nodes.text: The Javin sector, formerly part of Mugaari Space, was part of the Greater Javin region, and the first sector of the Outer Rim as one went rimward along the Corellian Trade Spine. The Spine cut directly through the sector, providing traffic to the nearby Ison Corridor and the neighboring Anoat and Yarith sectors. The Bruanii sector bordered to the north of Javin sector.
The sector capital was Javin. Other planets included Aztubek, Kumru, High Chunah, all along the Trade Spine.
